title: The Social Dilemma
description:
Tig and Cheryl discuss "The Social Dilemma," Netflix's social media critique that became one of the most viewed documentaries ever in 2020. Plus, Cheryl shares a different kind of social dilemma she faced on a recent flight, and Tig teases a potential big announcement regarding her own use of social media. Are you a snerkbol? *this episode spills beans* Get merch at podswag.com/truestory (tigandcheryltruestory@gmail.com)
